碪字的基本解释

碪
zhēn
同“砧”。

碪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》知林切，平侵，知。］
同“砧1”。
[②]［ǎn］
［《集韻》五感切，上感，疑。］
义未详。

碪字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　碪； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页833第14
【正字通】同砧。　又【集韻】五感切，音頷。碪?，山形。【左思·魏都賦】恆碣碪?於靑霄。○按《唐·?藏器·本草拾遺》有霹靂碪，云出雷州幷河東山澤閒，雷震後得之。《正字通》作䃡。

[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　碪; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 833 14
【Zhengzitong】Same as anvil.　[Jiyun] The five senses are cut, and the sound is nodded. Dot?, Yamagata. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] Heng Jie Diao? Yu Qian Xiao. ○According to "Tang··Tibetan·Materia Medica Supplements", there is a thunderbolt, and the cloud comes out of Leizhou and the Dongshan River is idle, and it is obtained after the thunderstorm. "Zhengzitong" is used as a tenant.
